import math
t=input()
for i in range(t):
    a=map(int,raw_input().split())
    a.sort()
    k=input()
    x=a[11-k]
    count=0
    i=11-k;
   
    while i<11 and a[i]==x:
        count=count+1
        i+=1
    b=a.count(x)
   
    ans=math.factorial(b)/(math.factorial(count)*math.factorial(b-count))
    print ans
